name: ACAccountType
desc: An object that encapsulates information about all accounts of a particular type.

items.name: var accessGranted: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the user granted the application access to accounts of this type.

items.name: var accountTypeDescription: String!
items.desc: A human-readable description of the account type.

items.name: var identifier: String!
items.desc: The unique identifier for the account type.
